Package com.behreajj.camzup.friendly

Class ImageEntity3

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Entity
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Entity3
com.behreajj.camzup.core.MeshEntity3
com.behreajj.camzup.friendly.ImageEntity3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBlenderWritable, IOriented3, ISpatial3, IVolume, IVolume3, Comparable<Entity3>, Iterable<Mesh3>
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextEntity3
public class ImageEntity3 extends MeshEntity3
A convenience to create image planes. Creates a mesh entity with a rectangular mesh scaled to the dimensions of an input image and a textured material.

    • ImageEntity3

      public ImageEntity3(String name, processing.core.PImage texture, Rgb tint, float scale, int alignHoriz, int alignVert)
      Creates a named image entity from a texture. The mesh's scale matches the aspect ratio; the entity's scale matches the image's longer edge.
      Parameters:
      name - the entity name
      texture - the image texture
      tint - the tint
      scale - the entity scale
      alignHoriz - the horizontal alignment
      alignVert - the vertical alignment
